data.description: Small TCP proxy for packet alteration
data.similar:
Net::Divert, similar put using freebsd divert sockets instead of
    proxying for modifying traffic
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Actually Net::ProxyMod has been in CPAN for some time, however now
    that I updated the module, I realized it might be helpful to
    register it as a module. It's in some sense in a similar category as
    Net::FTPServer.

    I'd like to have it listed, so it's easier to find.
